div.head: 陰腎萎弱
div.div: wilting and weakness of the yin[-member i.e. penis and] kidneys [i.e. testicles]

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: wilting and weakness of the yin[-member i.e. penis and] kidneys [i.e. testicles]

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin wei 陰痿 , dysfunction of the yin [member, i.e. penis]. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry a yue hun zi 阿月渾子 quoting Hai yao ben cao 海藥本草 Substance Entry wu ming mu pi 無名木 皮：主陰腎痿弱，囊下濕癢 , “It controls dysfunction and weakness of the yin-kidneys, and wet itching below the scrotum”, writes: 陰腎萎弱，囊下濕癢 , “ Wilting and weakness of the yin[-member, i.e. penis, and] kidneys [i.e. testicles] , and wet itching below the scrotum”.
